definition: to assess/to estimate (value of property, yield of harvest etc)

sentences.english: Crop identification is the basic work in crop yield estimation.
sentences.chinese: 作物识别是遥感作物估产的基础。

sentences.english: During the past years, crop yield estimation has gained increasing concerns within scientific literature of china.
sentences.chinese: 农作物估产是我国长期以来进行的一项重要课题。

sentences.english: Firstly, the author extensively reviewed different crop yield estimation methods in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先综述分析各类作物估产办法。

sentences.english: The detection and estimation of crop planting area is one of the key technologies of the remote sensing application in agriculture field.
sentences.chinese: 农作物种植面积监测是遥感估产的关键技术之一。

sentences.english: These results make a better foundation for large area crop estimates of cotton.
sentences.chinese: 上述分类结果为大面积棉花遥感估产打下了基础。

definition: early season rice/rice at transplanting or still unripe
long-grained rice (Indian rice, as opposed to round-grained rice)
to lose output/a drop in crop yield/reduction in production
